RelatedSentence: The State Government has allocated $ 50,000 to help support programs to protect one of Queensland 's most endangered animals .

RelatedSentence: Queensland Environment Minister Andrew Powell says the State Government is committed to working with organisations like the Save the Bilby Fund , to safeguard the future of the threatened species .
Queensland Environment Minister Andrew Powell says the State Government is committed to working with organisations like the Save the Bilby Fund , to safeguard the future of the threatened species .
The fund 's co-founder , Frank Manthey , has also announced his retirement from the foundation and will finish next month with a bilby show in Charleville .
